welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gatumba, where the captivating charm of Burundi awaits you. Known for its stunning landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the unique culture and beauty of this city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Melchior Ndadaye International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Melchior Ndadaye International Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kirundo Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kirundo Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
